entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
